question: What was the average Return on Equity (ROE) for  Vietcombank, Techcombank, and  VPBank  in 2022, and how did this compare to their respective subsidiaries' average ROE for the same year?

code.code:
WITH bank_roe AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code, 
        AVG(data) AS avg_roe
    FROM 
        financial_ratio
    WHERE 
        ratio_code = 'ROE' 
        AND year = 2022 
        AND quarter = 0
        AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code
),
subsidiary_roe AS (
    SELECT 
        s.stock_code, 
        AVG(fr.data) AS avg_roe
    FROM 
        sub_and_shareholder s
    JOIN 
        financial_ratio fr ON s.invest_on = fr.stock_code
    WHERE 
        fr.ratio_code = 'ROE' 
        AND fr.year = 2022 
        AND fr.quarter = 0
        AND s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        s.stock_code
)
SELECT 
    b.stock_code AS bank,
    b.avg_roe AS bank_avg_roe,
    s.avg_roe AS subsidiary_avg_roe
FROM 
    bank_roe b
LEFT JOIN 
    subsidiary_roe s ON b.stock_code = s.stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH parent_companies AS (
    SELECT 
        f.stock_code,
        AVG(f.data) AS avg_roe_parent
    FROM 
        financial_ratio f
    JOIN 
        company_info c ON f.stock_code = c.stock_code
    WHERE 
        f.year = 2022 AND f.quarter = 0 AND f.ratio_code = 'ROE'
        AND f.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        f.stock_code
),
sub_companies AS (
    SELECT 
        s.stock_code,
        AVG(f.data) AS avg_roe_sub
    FROM 
        financial_ratio f
    JOIN 
        sub_and_shareholder s ON f.stock_code = s.invest_on
    WHERE 
        f.year = 2022 AND f.quarter = 0 AND f.ratio_code = 'ROE'
        AND s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        s.stock_code
)
SELECT 
    p.stock_code AS parent_stock_code,
    p.avg_roe_parent,
    s.avg_roe_sub
FROM 
    parent_companies p
LEFT JOIN 
    sub_companies s ON p.stock_code = s.stock_code
ORDER BY 
    p.stock_code
LIMIT 10;

question: Compare the changes in  Property, Plant, and Equipment (PP&E)  for Vinamilk, Hoa Phat Group, and VinGroup from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Show the net increase/decrease each year.

code.code:
WITH ppe_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        SUM(data) AS total_ppe
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        category_code IN ('BS_220', 'BS_221', 'BS_224', 'BS_227', 'BS_263')
        AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'HPG', 'VIC')
        AND ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
),
ppe_change AS (
    SELECT 
        a.stock_code,
        a.year,
        a.total_ppe - COALESCE(b.total_ppe, 0) AS net_change
    FROM 
        ppe_data a
    LEFT JOIN 
        ppe_data b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code AND a.year = b.year + 1
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    net_change
FROM 
    ppe_change
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, year;

code_response.code:
WITH ppe_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        data
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'HPG', 'VIC')
        AND category_code = 'BS_100'
        AND (quarter = 0 OR (year = 2024 AND quarter IN (1, 2)))
),
yearly_changes AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 0 THEN data END) AS end_of_year,
        LAG(MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 0 THEN data END)) OVER (PARTITION BY stock_code ORDER BY year) AS start_of_year
    FROM 
        ppe_data
    WHERE 
        quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
),
quarterly_changes AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        data AS end_of_quarter,
        LAG(data) OVER (PARTITION BY stock_code, year ORDER BY quarter) AS start_of_quarter
    FROM 
        ppe_data
    WHERE 
        quarter != 0
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    'Yearly' AS period,
    end_of_year - start_of_year AS net_change
FROM 
    yearly_changes
WHERE 
    start_of_year IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    'Q' || quarter AS period,
    end_of_quarter - start_of_quarter AS net_change
FROM 
    quarterly_changes
WHERE 
    start_of_quarter IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, year, period
LIMIT 100;

question: Show the change in  total assets and total liabilities for Vinamilk, Masan Group, and Hoa Phat Group from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Calculate the debt-to-asset ratio for each company for each year.

code.code:
WITH AssetLiabilityData AS (
    SELECT
        nfr.stock_code,
        nfr.year,
        nfr.quarter,
        CASE
            WHEN mccnb.en_caption = 'TOTAL ASSETS' THEN nfr.data
            ELSE 0
        END AS total_assets,
        CASE
            WHEN mccnb.en_caption = 'TOTAL LIABILITIES AND EQUITY' THEN nfr.data
            ELSE 0
        END AS total_liabilities
    FROM
        non_bank_financial_report nfr
    JOIN
        map_category_code_non_bank mccnb ON nfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
    WHERE
        nfr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG')
        AND mccnb.en_caption IN ('TOTAL ASSETS', 'TOTAL LIABILITIES AND EQUITY')
        AND ((nfr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND nfr.quarter = 0) OR (nfr.year = 2024 AND nfr.quarter = 2))
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        SUM(total_assets) AS total_assets,
        SUM(total_liabilities) AS total_liabilities
    FROM
        AssetLiabilityData
    GROUP BY
        stock_code, year, quarter
)
SELECT
    ad.stock_code,
    ad.year,
    ad.quarter,
    ad.total_assets,
    ad.total_liabilities,
    fr.data AS debt_to_asset_ratio
FROM
    AggregatedData ad
LEFT JOIN
    financial_ratio fr ON ad.stock_code = fr.stock_code AND ad.year = fr.year AND ad.quarter = fr.quarter
WHERE
    fr.ratio_code = 'DTAR'
ORDER BY
    ad.stock_code, ad.year, ad.quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH financial_data AS (
    SELECT 
        c.stock_code,
        c.en_company_name,
        f.year,
        f.quarter,
        m.category_code,
        m.en_caption,
        f.data
    FROM 
        company_info c
    JOIN 
        non_bank_financial_report f ON c.stock_code = f.stock_code
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_non_bank m ON f.category_code = m.category_code
    WHERE 
        c.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG')
        AND f.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND f.quarter <= 2
        AND m.category_code IN ('BS_100', 'BS_200')
),
total_assets AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        en_company_name,
        data AS total_assets
    FROM 
        financial_data
    WHERE 
        category_code = 'BS_100'
),
total_liabilities AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        en_company_name,
        data AS total_liabilities
    FROM 
        financial_data
    WHERE 
        category_code = 'BS_200'
)
SELECT 
    a.stock_code,
    a.en_company_name,
    a.year,
    a.total_assets,
    l.total_liabilities,
    (l.total_liabilities / a.total_assets) AS debt_to_asset_ratio
FROM 
    total_assets a
JOIN 
    total_liabilities l ON a.stock_code = l.stock_code AND a.year = l.year AND a.en_company_name = l.en_company_name
ORDER BY 
    a.stock_code, a.year
LIMIT 100;

-- Query to find the top 5 companies with the highest Total Assets as of Q2 2024

SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, ci.is_bank, ci.is_securities, fr.data AS total_assets
FROM (
    SELECT stock_code, data
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT stock_code, data
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT stock_code, data
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
) AS fr
JOIN company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY fr.data DESC
LIMIT 5;

    SELECT

    FROM

code.code:
SELECT 
    fr.year, 
    fr.quarter, 
    ci.stock_code, 
    ci.en_company_name, 
    fr.data AS fcff
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG') 
    AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Free Cash Flow'
    AND ((fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter = 2))
ORDER BY 
    ci.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter;

code_response.code:
SELECT 
    f.stock_code,
    c.en_company_name,
    f.year,
    f.quarter,
    f.data AS fcff
FROM 
    financial_ratio f
JOIN 
    company_info c ON f.stock_code = c.stock_code
WHERE 
    f.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG')
    AND f.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    AND (f.quarter = 0 OR (f.year = 2024 AND f.quarter <= 2))
    AND f.ratio_code = 'FCFF'
ORDER BY 
    f.stock_code, f.year, f.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: What is the trend of the Cash Flow from Operating Activities to Total Assets ratio for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB from 2020 to Q2 2024?

WHERE

question: Compare the change in the Free Cash Flow (FCF) to Revenue ratio for Vinamilk, Masan Group, and SABECO from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Calculate FCF as Operating Cash Flow - Capital Expenditures.

code.code:
WITH fcf_calculation AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_020' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS operating_cash_flow,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_021' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS capital_expenditures,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'IS_030' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS revenue
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB') AND
        ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) AND (quarter = 0 OR quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year, quarter
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    (operating_cash_flow - capital_expenditures) AS free_cash_flow,
    revenue,
    CASE 
        WHEN revenue != 0 THEN (operating_cash_flow - capital_expenditures) / revenue
        ELSE NULL
    END AS fcf_to_revenue_ratio
FROM 
    fcf_calculation
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, year, quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH fcf_revenue_ratio AS (
    SELECT
        f.stock_code,
        f.year,
        f.quarter,
        f.data AS fcf,
        r.data AS revenue,
        (f.data / r.data) AS fcf_to_revenue_ratio
    FROM
        financial_ratio f
    JOIN
        financial_ratio r ON f.stock_code = r.stock_code AND f.year = r.year AND f.quarter = r.quarter
    WHERE
        f.ratio_code = 'FCF'
        AND r.ratio_code = 'REVENUE'
        AND f.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
        AND (
            (f.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND f.quarter = 0)
            OR (f.year = 2024 AND f.quarter BETWEEN 1 AND 2)
        )
)
SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    fcf,
    revenue,
    fcf_to_revenue_ratio
FROM
    fcf_revenue_ratio
ORDER BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: Calculate the return on equity (ROE) for Vinamilk and Masan Group for the fiscal year 2022, and also provide their total equity for the same year.

code.code:
-- Query to get ROE for Vinamilk and Masan Group for the fiscal year 2022
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.data AS roe,
    nbfr.data AS total_equity
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    non_bank_financial_report nbfr ON fr.stock_code = nbfr.stock_code AND fr.year = nbfr.year
WHERE 
    fr.ratio_code = 'ROE'
    AND fr.year = 2022
    AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND nbfr.category_code = 'BS_410'
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN');

code_response.code:

SELECT 
    ci.en_company_name,
    fr.data AS roe,
    nfr.data AS total_equity
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
JOIN 
    non_bank_financial_report nfr ON ci.stock_code = nfr.stock_code
WHERE 
    ci.stock_code = 'VNM'
    AND fr.year = 2022
    AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND fr.ratio_code = 'ROE'
    AND nfr.year = 2022
    AND nfr.quarter = 0
    AND nfr.category_code = 'BS_300' -- Assuming BS_300 is the category code for Total Equity

UNION

-- Query for Masan Group (MSN)
SELECT

    fr.data AS roe,
    nfr.data AS total_equity
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
JOIN 
    non_bank_financial_report nfr ON ci.stock_code = nfr.stock_code
WHERE 
    ci.stock_code = 'MSN'

    AND fr.ratio_code = 'ROE'
    AND nfr.year = 2022
    AND nfr.quarter = 0

LIMIT 10;

code.code:
(
    SELECT c.stock_code, c.industry, nfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM non_bank_financial_report nfr
    JOIN company_info c ON nfr.stock_code = c.stock_code
    WHERE nfr.year = 2022 AND nfr.quarter = 0 AND nfr.category_code = 'CF_020'
)
UNION ALL
(
    SELECT c.stock_code, c.industry, bfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM bank_financial_report bfr
    JOIN company_info c ON bfr.stock_code = c.stock_code
    WHERE bfr.year = 2022 AND bfr.quarter = 0 AND bfr.category_code = 'CF_009'
)
UNION ALL
(
    SELECT c.stock_code, c.industry, sfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM securities_financial_report sfr
    JOIN company_info c ON sfr.stock_code = c.stock_code
    WHERE sfr.year = 2022 AND sfr.quarter = 0 AND sfr.category_code = 'CF_060'
)

| VGI          | Tổng Công ty Cổ phần Đầu tư Quốc tế Viettel | Telecommunications                   |                 1.36636e+07 |
| GAS          | Tổng Công ty Khí Việt Nam - Công ty Cổ phần | Utilities (Electricity, Water & Gas) |                 1.27921e+07 |

code_response.code:
WITH operating_cash_flow AS (
    SELECT 
        bfr.stock_code,
        SUM(bfr.data) AS total_operating_cash_flow
    FROM 
        bank_financial_report bfr
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_bank mccb ON bfr.category_code = mccb.category_code
    WHERE 
        bfr.year = 2022 AND bfr.quarter = 0 AND mccb.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities before changes in assets and working capital'
    GROUP BY 
        bfr.stock_code

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        nfr.stock_code,
        SUM(nfr.data) AS total_operating_cash_flow
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report nfr
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_non_bank mcnb ON nfr.category_code = mcnb.category_code
    WHERE 
        nfr.year = 2022 AND nfr.quarter = 0 AND mcnb.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities'
    GROUP BY 
        nfr.stock_code

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        sfr.stock_code,
        SUM(sfr.data) AS total_operating_cash_flow
    FROM 
        securities_financial_report sfr
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_securities mcs ON sfr.category_code = mcs.category_code
    WHERE 
        sfr.year = 2022 AND sfr.quarter = 0 AND mcs.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities'
    GROUP BY 
        sfr.stock_code
)

SELECT 
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.company_name,
    ci.industry,
    ocf.total_operating_cash_flow
FROM 
    operating_cash_flow ocf
JOIN 
    company_info ci ON ocf.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY 
    ocf.total_operating_cash_flow DESC
LIMIT 5;

code.code:
-- Step 1: Retrieve Current Ratio and Quick Ratio
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    mccr.ratio_name,
    fr.data AS ratio_value
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND mccr.ratio_name IN ('Current Ratio', 'Quick Ratio')
    AND ((fr.year = 2020 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2021 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2023 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter IN (1, 2)));

-- Step 2: Analyze changes in cash and short-term investments
SELECT 
    nbf.stock_code,
    nbf.year,
    nbf.quarter,
    mccnb.en_caption,
    nbf.data AS financial_data
FROM 
    non_bank_financial_report nbf
JOIN 
    map_category_code_non_bank mccnb ON nbf.category_code = mccnb.category_code
WHERE 
    nbf.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND mccnb.en_caption IN ('I. Cash and cash equivalents', 'II. Short-term financial investments')
    AND ((nbf.year = 2020 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2021 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2022 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2023 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2024 AND nbf.quarter IN (1, 2)));

code_response.code:
WITH financial_ratios AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        ratio_code,
        data
    FROM 
        financial_ratio
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
        AND ratio_code IN ('CurrentR', 'QR')
        AND ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter <= 2))
),
cash_and_investments AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        category_code,
        data
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
        AND category_code IN ('BS_110', 'BS_111') -- Assuming BS_110 is cash and BS_111 is short-term investments
        AND ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter <= 2))
)
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    fr.ratio_code,
    fr.data AS ratio_value,
    cai.category_code,
    cai.data AS cash_investment_value
FROM 
    financial_ratios fr
LEFT JOIN 
    cash_and_investments cai
ON 
    fr.stock_code = cai.stock_code
    AND fr.year = cai.year
    AND fr.quarter = cai.quarter
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: Compare the Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC) of Vinamilk and Masan Group in 2023 Q2.  Calculate CCC using the average inventory, accounts receivable, and accounts payable.

code.code:
WITH Inventory AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS inventory
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code IN ('BS_140', 'BS_141')
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
),
Receivables AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS receivables
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code = 'BS_131'
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
),
Payables AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS payables
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code = 'BS_311'
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
)
SELECT 
    i.stock_code,
    i.inventory,
    r.receivables,
    p.payables,
    -- Assuming some constants for days in period and cost of goods sold for calculation
    (i.inventory / 365) AS DIO, 
    (r.receivables / 365) AS DSO,
    (p.payables / 365) AS DPO,
    ((i.inventory / 365) + (r.receivables / 365) - (p.payables / 365)) AS CCC
FROM Inventory i
JOIN Receivables r ON i.stock_code = r.stock_code
JOIN Payables p ON i.stock_code = p.stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH financial_data AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        category_code,
        data
    FROM
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
        AND year = 2023
        AND quarter = 2
        AND category_code IN ('BS_100', 'BS_110', 'BS_200')
),
ccc_calculation AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_100' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS inventory,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_110' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS accounts_receivable,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_200' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS accounts_payable
    FROM
        financial_data
    GROUP BY
        stock_code
)
SELECT
    stock_code,
    inventory,
    accounts_receivable,
    accounts_payable,
    (inventory + accounts_receivable - accounts_payable) AS cash_conversion_cycle
FROM
    ccc_calculation
ORDER BY
    stock_code;

| VIB          | Banking     |   0.0698803 |
| VHM          | Real Estate |   0.0646859 |
| VCB          | Banking     |   0.0624534 |
| MBB          | Banking     |   0.056319  |

code.code:
WITH total_assets AS (
    SELECT stock_code, MAX(data) AS max_total_assets
    FROM (
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM securities_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    ) AS combined_assets
    GROUP BY stock_code
    HAVING MAX(data) > 100000000
),
roe_data AS (
    SELECT stock_code, AVG(data) AS avg_roe
    FROM financial_ratio
    WHERE ratio_code = 'ROE' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    GROUP BY stock_code
)
SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, roe_data.avg_roe
FROM roe_data
JOIN total_assets ON roe_data.stock_code = total_assets.stock_code
JOIN company_info ci ON roe_data.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY roe_data.avg_roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

code_response.code:
WITH Total_Assets AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        SUM(data) AS total_assets
    FROM (
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND quarter = 0
        UNION ALL
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter = 0
        UNION ALL
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM securities_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter = 0
    ) AS combined_assets
    GROUP BY stock_code
    HAVING SUM(data) > 100000000000000 -- 100,000 billion VND
),
ROE_Data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        data AS roe
    FROM financial_ratio
    WHERE ratio_code = 'ROE' AND quarter != 0
),
Filtered_ROE AS (
    SELECT 
        roe.stock_code,
        roe.year,
        roe.quarter,
        roe.roe
    FROM ROE_Data roe
    JOIN Total_Assets ta ON roe.stock_code = ta.stock_code
    WHERE roe.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND roe.quarter BETWEEN 2 AND 4
)
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    fr.roe
FROM Filtered_ROE fr
JOIN company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY fr.roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH net_income_exceeding AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        SUM(data) AS total_net_income
    FROM (
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'IS_021' AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND quarter != 0

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'IS_400' AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND quarter != 0

    HAVING SUM(data) > 1000000

    JOIN net_income_exceeding nie ON fr.stock_code = nie.stock_code
    WHERE fr.ratio_code = 'DTER' AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND fr.quarter != 0
    ORDER BY fr.data DESC
    LIMIT 10
)

    ci.stock_code,

    ci.is_bank,

code_response.code:
WITH combined_financial_reports AS (
    SELECT stock_code, year, quarter, category_code, data
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE (year = 2020 AND quarter = 2) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 0)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, year, quarter, category_code, data
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE (year = 2020 AND quarter = 2) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 0)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, year, quarter, category_code, data
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE (year = 2020 AND quarter = 2) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 0)
),
net_income AS (
    SELECT stock_code, SUM(data) AS net_income
    FROM combined_financial_reports
    WHERE (category_code = 'IS_012' AND stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM company_info WHERE is_bank = TRUE))
       OR (category_code = 'IS_030' AND stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM company_info WHERE is_bank = FALSE AND is_securities = FALSE))
       OR (category_code = 'IS_400' AND stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM company_info WHERE is_securities = TRUE))
    GROUP BY stock_code
    HAVING SUM(data) > 1000000 -- 1,000 billion VND
),
debt_to_equity AS (
    SELECT fr.stock_code, fr.data AS debt_to_equity_ratio
    FROM financial_ratio fr
    JOIN net_income ni ON fr.stock_code = ni.stock_code
    WHERE fr.ratio_code = 'DTER'
      AND fr.quarter = 0
)
SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.company_name, ci.en_company_name, ci.industry, de.debt_to_equity_ratio
FROM debt_to_equity de
JOIN company_info ci ON de.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY de.debt_to_equity_ratio
LIMIT 10;

question: What are the top 5 companies with the highest Total Assets as of December 31, 2023?

code.code:
-- Step 1: Identify the category codes for "Total Assets"
-- For banks, the category code is BS_300
-- For non-bank corporations, the category code is BS_270
-- For securities firms, the category code is BS_270

-- Step 2, 3, 4: Retrieve, combine, and order the data

SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, ci.issue_share, total_assets
FROM (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
) AS combined_reports
JOIN company_info ci ON combined_reports.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY total_assets DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.company_name,
    ci.en_company_name,
    ci.industry,
    ci.is_bank,
    ci.is_securities,
    COALESCE(bfr.data, nfr.data, sfr.data) AS total_assets
FROM 
    company_info ci
LEFT JOIN 
    bank_financial_report bfr ON ci.stock_code = bfr.stock_code AND bfr.year = 2023 AND bfr.quarter = 0 AND bfr.category_code = 'BS_300'
LEFT JOIN 
    non_bank_financial_report nfr ON ci.stock_code = nfr.stock_code AND nfr.year = 2023 AND nfr.quarter = 0 AND nfr.category_code = 'BS_270'
LEFT JOIN 
    securities_financial_report sfr ON ci.stock_code = sfr.stock_code AND sfr.year = 2023 AND sfr.quarter = 0 AND sfr.category_code = 'BS_270'
WHERE 
    COALESCE(bfr.data, nfr.data, sfr.data) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 
    COALESCE(bfr.data, nfr.data, sfr.data) DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT

    c.en_company_name,
    COALESCE(bfr_assets.data, 0) AS total_assets,
    COALESCE(bfr_liabilities.data, 0) AS total_liabilities
FROM

ON

    AND bfr_liabilities.quarter = 0

question: Rank the top 5 companies with the highest Return on Equity (ROE) among  Vietcombank, Techcombank, ACB, BIDV, and VietinBank for the period from 2020 to Q2 2024,  filtering for companies with total assets exceeding 100 billion VND in each year.

code.code:
WITH TotalAssets AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code, 
        year, 
        SUM(data) AS total_assets
    FROM 
        bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        category_code = 'BS_300' -- Total assets for banks
        AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND (quarter = 0 OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
    HAVING 
        SUM(data) > 100000 -- 100 billion VND
),
ROEData AS (
    SELECT 
        fr.stock_code, 
        fr.year, 
        fr.quarter, 
        fr.data AS roe
    FROM 
        financial_ratio fr
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
    WHERE 
        mccr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
        AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB', 'BID', 'CTG')
        AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND (fr.quarter = 0 OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter = 2))
)
SELECT 
    roe.stock_code, 
    roe.year, 
    roe.quarter, 
    roe.roe
FROM 
    ROEData roe
JOIN 
    TotalAssets ta ON roe.stock_code = ta.stock_code AND roe.year = ta.year
ORDER BY 
    roe.roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

code_response.code:
WITH filtered_data AS (
    SELECT 
        fr.stock_code,
        fr.year,
        fr.quarter,
        fr.data AS roe,
        bfr.data AS total_assets
    FROM 
        financial_ratio fr
    JOIN 
        bank_financial_report bfr ON fr.stock_code = bfr.stock_code AND fr.year = bfr.year
    WHERE 
        fr.ratio_code = 'ROE'
        AND fr.quarter != 0
        AND bfr.category_code = 'BS_300'
        AND bfr.quarter != 0
        AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB', 'BID', 'VPB')
        AND bfr.data > 100000 -- Total assets in million VND, so 100 billion VND is 100000 million VND
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        roe,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY roe DESC) AS roe_rank
    FROM 
        filtered_data
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    roe
FROM 
    ranked_data
WHERE 
    roe_rank <= 5
ORDER BY 
    year, roe_rank
LIMIT 50; -- Limiting to 50 to ensure we capture top 5 for each year

WITH TotalAssets AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
),
OperatingCashFlow AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_009' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_020' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_060' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
)
SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, ocf.operating_cash_flow
FROM OperatingCashFlow ocf
JOIN TotalAssets ta ON ocf.stock_code = ta.stock_code
JOIN company_info ci ON ocf.stock_code = ci.stock_code
WHERE ta.total_assets > 100000
ORDER BY ocf.operating_cash_flow DESC
LIMIT 5;

code_response.code:
WITH total_assets AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        CASE 
            WHEN is_bank THEN data
            ELSE data
        END AS total_assets
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            bfr.stock_code,
            bfr.data,
            ci.is_bank
        FROM bank_financial_report bfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON bfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE bfr.category_code = 'BS_300'
          AND bfr.year = 2024
          AND bfr.quarter = 0
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 
            nfr.stock_code,
            nfr.data,
            ci.is_bank
        FROM non_bank_financial_report nfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON nfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE nfr.category_code = 'BS_270'
          AND nfr.year = 2024
          AND nfr.quarter = 0
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 
            sfr.stock_code,
            sfr.data,
            ci.is_bank
        FROM securities_financial_report sfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON sfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE sfr.category_code = 'BS_270'
          AND sfr.year = 2024
          AND sfr.quarter = 0
    ) AS subquery
),
operating_cash_flow AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        CASE 
            WHEN is_bank THEN data
            WHEN is_securities THEN data
            ELSE data
        END AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            bfr.stock_code,
            bfr.data,
            ci.is_bank,
            ci.is_securities
        FROM bank_financial_report bfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON bfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE bfr.category_code = 'CF_009'
          AND bfr.year = 2024
          AND bfr.quarter = 2
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 
            nfr.stock_code,
            nfr.data,
            ci.is_bank,
            ci.is_securities
        FROM non_bank_financial_report nfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON nfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE nfr.category_code = 'CF_020'
          AND nfr.year = 2024
          AND nfr.quarter = 2
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 
            sfr.stock_code,
            sfr.data,
            ci.is_bank,
            ci.is_securities
        FROM securities_financial_report sfr
        JOIN company_info ci ON sfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
        WHERE sfr.category_code = 'CF_060'
          AND sfr.year = 2024
          AND sfr.quarter = 2
    ) AS subquery
)
SELECT 
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.industry,
    ta.total_assets,
    oc.operating_cash_flow
FROM company_info ci
JOIN total_assets ta ON ci.stock_code = ta.stock_code
JOIN operating_cash_flow oc ON ci.stock_code = oc.stock_code
WHERE ta.total_assets > 100000 -- 100 billion VND
ORDER BY oc.operating_cash_flow DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: For the year 2023, what was the Debt-to-Equity ratio for VinGroup,  and how does this ratio change when considering the consolidated financial statements including its subsidiaries' debt and equity?

code.code:
-- Step 1: Retrieve the Debt-to-Equity ratio for VinGroup for the year 2023
SELECT fr.data AS standalone_dter
FROM financial_ratio fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE fr.stock_code = 'VIC'
  AND fr.year = 2023
  AND fr.quarter = 0
  AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio';

-- Step 2: Identify the subsidiaries of VinGroup
WITH subsidiaries AS (
    SELECT invest_on
    FROM sub_and_shareholder
    WHERE stock_code = 'VIC'
)

-- Step 3: Retrieve debt and equity data for VinGroup and its subsidiaries
, debt_equity_data AS (
    SELECT stock_code,
           SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_400' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_liabilities,
           SUM(CASE WHEN category_code IN ('BS_400', 'BS_410', 'BS_420') THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_equity
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE (stock_code = 'VIC' OR stock_code IN (SELECT invest_on FROM subsidiaries))
      AND year = 2023
      AND quarter = 0
    GROUP BY stock_code
)

-- Step 4: Calculate the consolidated Debt-to-Equity ratio
, consolidated_dter AS (
    SELECT SUM(total_liabilities) / NULLIF(SUM(total_equity), 0) AS consolidated_dter
    FROM debt_equity_data
)

-- Step 5: Combine results
SELECT standalone_dter, consolidated_dter
FROM (
    SELECT fr.data AS standalone_dter
    FROM financial_ratio fr
    JOIN map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
    WHERE fr.stock_code = 'VIC'
      AND fr.year = 2023
      AND fr.quarter = 0
      AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
) AS standalone,
consolidated_dter;

code_response.code:
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    fr.data AS current_ratio
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    company_info ci ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mcr ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'STB')
    AND fr.ratio_code = 'CurrentR'
    AND (
        (fr.year = 2020 AND fr.quarter = 0)
        OR (fr.year = 2021 AND fr.quarter = 0)
        OR (fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter = 0)
        OR (fr.year = 2023 AND fr.quarter = 0)
        OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter IN (1, 2))
    )
ORDER BY 
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: For the period 2020-Q2 2024, provide the year-over-year change in cash and cash equivalents, and short-term borrowings for Mobile World Investment, Vinamilk, and PetroVietnam Gas.  Calculate the cash ratio for each company for each year.

code.code:
WITH cash_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_110' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS cash_and_cash_equivalents,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_320' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS short_term_borrowings
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'GAS') 
        AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
),
year_over_year_change AS (
    SELECT 
        a.stock_code,
        a.year,
        (a.cash_and_cash_equivalents - b.cash_and_cash_equivalents) / NULLIF(b.cash_and_cash_equivalents, 0) * 100 AS yoy_change_cash,
        (a.short_term_borrowings - b.short_term_borrowings) / NULLIF(b.short_term_borrowings, 0) * 100 AS yoy_change_borrowings
    FROM 
        cash_data a
    LEFT JOIN 
        cash_data b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code AND a.year = b.year + 1
),
cash_ratio AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        cash_and_cash_equivalents / NULLIF(short_term_borrowings, 0) AS cash_ratio
    FROM 
        cash_data
)
SELECT 
    y.stock_code,
    y.year,
    y.yoy_change_cash,
    y.yoy_change_borrowings,
    c.cash_ratio
FROM 
    year_over_year_change y
JOIN 
    cash_ratio c ON y.stock_code = c.stock_code AND y.year = c.year
ORDER BY 
    y.stock_code, y.year;

code_response.code:
WITH financial_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        category_code,
        data
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'GAS')
      AND year IN (2020, 2024)
      AND quarter IN (0, 2)
      AND category_code IN ('BS_101', 'BS_110') -- Assuming BS_101 is Cash and Cash Equivalents and BS_110 is Short-term Borrowings
),

cash_and_borrowings AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_101' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS cash_and_cash_equivalents,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_110' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS short_term_borrowings
    FROM financial_data
    GROUP BY stock_code, year, quarter
),

year_over_year_change AS (
    SELECT 
        a.stock_code,
        a.year,
        a.quarter,
        (a.cash_and_cash_equivalents - b.cash_and_cash_equivalents) / NULLIF(b.cash_and_cash_equivalents, 0) AS yoy_cash_change,
        (a.short_term_borrowings - b.short_term_borrowings) / NULLIF(b.short_term_borrowings, 0) AS yoy_borrowings_change
    FROM cash_and_borrowings a
    LEFT JOIN cash_and_borrowings b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code AND a.quarter = b.quarter AND a.year - 1 = b.year
    WHERE a.quarter = 2
),

cash_ratio AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        cash_and_cash_equivalents / NULLIF(short_term_borrowings, 0) AS cash_ratio
    FROM cash_and_borrowings
)

SELECT 
    ci.en_company_name,
    yoy.year,
    yoy.quarter,
    yoy.yoy_cash_change,
    yoy.yoy_borrowings_change,
    cr.cash_ratio
FROM year_over_year_change yoy
JOIN cash_ratio cr ON yoy.stock_code = cr.stock_code AND yoy.year = cr.year AND yoy.quarter = cr.quarter
JOIN company_info ci ON yoy.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY ci.en_company_name, yoy.year, yoy.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: What was the average Return on Equity (ROE) for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and VPBank in Q2 2024, and how does this compare to their respective average ROE for the same quarter in 2020, considering their investments in subsidiaries?

code.code:
WITH bank_and_subsidiaries AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT f.stock_code, f.year, f.quarter, f.data
    FROM financial_ratio f
    JOIN map_category_code_ratio m ON f.ratio_code = m.ratio_code
    LEFT JOIN sub_and_shareholder s ON f.stock_code = s.stock_code OR f.stock_code = s.invest_on
    WHERE m.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
      AND f.quarter = 2
      AND f.year IN (2020, 2024)
      AND (f.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB') OR s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB'))
)
SELECT stock_code, year, AVG(data) AS average_roe
FROM bank_and_subsidiaries
GROUP BY stock_code, year
ORDER BY stock_code, year;

code_response.code:
WITH roe_2024 AS (
    SELECT 
        c.stock_code,
        c.en_company_name,
        f.data AS roe_2024
    FROM 
        financial_ratio f
    JOIN 
        company_info c ON f.stock_code = c.stock_code
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_ratio mcr ON f.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
    WHERE 
        c.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND f.year = 2024
        AND f.quarter = 2
        AND mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
),
roe_2020_avg AS (
    SELECT 
        c.stock_code,
        c.en_company_name,
        AVG(f.data) AS roe_2020_avg
    FROM 
        financial_ratio f
    JOIN 
        company_info c ON f.stock_code = c.stock_code
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_ratio mcr ON f.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
    WHERE 
        c.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND f.year = 2020
        AND f.quarter = 2
        AND mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
    GROUP BY 
        c.stock_code, c.en_company_name
),
investments AS (
    SELECT 
        c.stock_code,
        c.en_company_name,
        COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN mcb.category_code = 'BS_211' THEN f.data ELSE 0 END), 0) AS investments_in_subsidiaries
    FROM 
        bank_financial_report f
    JOIN 
        company_info c ON f.stock_code = c.stock_code
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_bank mcb ON f.category_code = mcb.category_code
    WHERE 
        c.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND f.year = 2024
        AND f.quarter = 2
    GROUP BY 
        c.stock_code, c.en_company_name
)
SELECT 
    r24.stock_code,
    r24.en_company_name,
    r24.roe_2024,
    r20.roe_2020_avg,
    i.investments_in_subsidiaries
FROM 
    roe_2024 r24
JOIN 
    roe_2020_avg r20 ON r24.stock_code = r20.stock_code
JOIN 
    investments i ON r24.stock_code = i.stock_code
ORDER BY 
    r24.stock_code
LIMIT 10;
